text: The Nautilus was steadily pursuing its southerly course, following the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: fiftieth meridian with considerable speed.  Did he wish to reach the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: pole?  I did not think so, for every attempt to reach that point had
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: hitherto failed.  Again, the season was far advanced, for in the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: Antarctic regions the 13th of March corresponds with the 13th of
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: September of northern regions, which begin at the equinoctial season.
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: On the 14th of March I saw floating ice in latitude 55 deg., merely
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: pale bits of debris from twenty to twenty-five feet long, forming banks
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: over which the sea curled.  The Nautilus remained on the surface of the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: ocean.  Ned Land, who had fished in the Arctic Seas, was familiar with
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: its icebergs; but Conseil and I admired them for the first time.  In
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: the atmosphere towards the southern horizon stretched a white dazzling
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: band.  English whalers have given it the name of "ice blink."  However
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: thick the clouds may be, it is always visible, and announces the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: presence of an ice pack or bank.  Accordingly, larger blocks soon
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: appeared, whose brilliancy changed with the caprices of the fog.  Some
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: of these masses showed green veins, as if long undulating lines had
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: amethysts with the light shining through them.  Some reflected the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: number and importance.

text: At 60 deg. lat. every pass had disappeared.  But, seeking carefully,
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: Captain Nemo soon found a narrow opening, through which he boldly
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: slipped, knowing, however, that it would close behind him.  Thus,
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: guided by this clever hand, the Nautilus passed through all the ice
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: with a precision which quite charmed Conseil; icebergs or mountains,
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: deg. or 3 deg. below zero, but we were warmly clad with fur, at the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: waves to find a more bearable temperature.  Two months earlier we
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: we were in the latitude of New Shetland and South Orkney.  The Captain
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: told me that formerly numerous tribes of seals inhabited them; but that
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea

text: About eight o'clock on the morning of the 16th of March the Nautilus,
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: following the fifty-fifth meridian, cut the Antarctic polar circle.
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ice surrounded us on all sides, and closed the horizon.  But Captain
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: Nemo went from one opening to another, still going higher.  I cannot
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: express my astonishment at the beauties of these new regions.  The ice
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: took most surprising forms.  Here the grouping formed an oriental town,
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: with innumerable mosques and minarets; there a fallen city thrown to
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: the earth, as it were, by some convulsion of nature.  The whole aspect
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: indication, Captain Nemo would discover a new pass.  He was never
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: however, the ice-fields absolutely blocked our road.  It was not the
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: wedge, and split it with frightful crackings.  It was the battering ram

author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: For several days the Nautilus kept off from the American coast.
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: the sea of the Antilles.  April 16th, we sighted Martinique and
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: Guadaloupe from a distance of about thirty miles.  I saw their tall
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: peaks for an instant.  The Canadian, who counted on carrying out his
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: projects in the Gulf, by either landing or hailing one of the numerous
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: boats that coast from one island to another, was quite disheartened.
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: had a long conversation on this subject.  For six months we had been
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: prisoners on board the Nautilus.  We had travelled 17,000 leagues; and,
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: as Ned Land said, there was no reason why it should come to an end.  We
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: ourselves.  Besides, for some time past he had become graver, more
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

text: retired, less sociable.  He seemed to shun me.  I met him rarely.
title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea
author: Verne, Jules

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea

author: Verne, Jules
